description: Odd squarefree numbers for which the number of prime divisors is odd.
comments: Liouville function lambda(n) (A008836) is negative.m is a term iff mu(m)^m < 0 (A080323(a(n))<0), where mu is the Moebius function (A008683). - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Feb 14 2003
references: H. Gupta, A formula for L(n), J. Indian Math. Soc., 7 (1943), 68-71.
links: Charles R Greathouse IV, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
H. Gupta, A formula for L(n), J. Indian Math. Soc., 7 (1943), 68-71. [Annotated scanned copy]
prog: (PARI) isok(n) = (n%2) && issquarefree(n) && (omega(n)%2) \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 15 2013(PARI) is(n)=if(n%2, my(f=factor(n)[,2]);n>1 && vecmax(f)<2 && #f%2, 0) \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Jun 15 2013
author: _James A. Sellers_, Jul 07 2000
